info.description: Live Helper Chat API description. You have to authorize to use API. Create API key in Live Helper Chat back office. During authorization provide operator username and key instead of password.
info.title: Live Helper Chat API

parameters.name: department_groups
parameters.description: Should we include department_groups attribute in response

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: How many seconds has to be passed from chat start. It's usefull if you want to fetch chats older than n seconds. It's time in seconds from chat start.

parameters.name: last_user_msg_time_gt
parameters.description: Last user message time greater than

parameters.name: prefill_fields
parameters.description: What fields to prefill E.g time_created_front, department_name, plain_user_name, product_name, n_official, n_off_full, wait_time_pending, wait_time_seconds, cls_time_front, tatus_sub_sub, can_edit_chat, unread_time

parameters.name: ignore_fields
parameters.description: What fields to skip E.g product_id, product, department, time, status, user, additional_data, additional_data_array, chat_variables, chat_variables_array

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: How many seconds has to be passed from chat start. It's usefull if you want to fetch chats older than n seconds. It's time in seconds from chat start.

parameters.name: last_user_msg_time_gt
parameters.description: Last user message time greater than

parameters.name: ctime
parameters.description: Create time greater than. Unix timestamp

parameters.name: con_time
parameters.description: Conversion time greater than. Unix timestamp

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Hash, optional variable. If provided it will be validated against chat hash also.

parameters.name: department_groups
parameters.description: Should we include department_groups attribute in response

parameters.name: workflow
parameters.description: Should workflow be executed. Like auto responder. Usefull if you are building visitors custom interface.

parameters.name: last_message_id
parameters.description: Last message ID from which should be returned next messages.

parameters.name: ignore_system_messages
parameters.description: Should system messages be ignored or not.

parameters.name: extract_media
parameters.description: Should we include separate array of related files to a message?

parameters.name: remove_media
parameters.description: Remove bbcode tags from message if it's only file message?

parameters.name: as_html
parameters.description: Render message body as HTML instead of BBCode

post.summary: Add message to chat as a user

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Hash. If you skip hash make sure you set validation headers. Otherwise it is are not required to set validation header.

post.summary: Add message to chat as an admin

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Sender - operator or bot is sending a message. On it depends how Live Helper Chat will change chat statuses.

parameters.name: operator_name
parameters.description: Set custom operator name for a message

post.description: Changes chat status to provided one. Related logic is also executed in the background.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: 0 - pending, 1 - active, 2 - closed chat, chat box chat - 3, operators chat - 4, bot chat - 5

post.summary: Fetches user and verifies provided password
post.description: If user_id is provided. Systems tries to find provided user. If not system tries to find user by email or username. If password is provided it verifies provided password.

get.description: Returns list of all system users.
Returns global status is anyone online

get.summary: Check is user anyone from operators online for provided chat
Returns objects by object id and type
get.description: Is used to get objects by object id and type. This can be used in third party software to have custom permissions.

get.summary: Returns list of groups id by object id and type
get.description: Is used to get list of groups by object id and type. This can be used in third party software to have custom permissions.

get.summary: Returns list of objects user can access by user id and type of object
Updates last operator activity. So chat considers operator as online
get.description: Updates last operator activity. So chat considers operator as online

get.summary: Changes operator status to offline or online
get.description: Updates operator status to online or offline

post.summary: Login to application, also registers device if required

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Department object that needs to be added to the lhc

200.description: Creates a department with provided attributes

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Bot object that needs to be added to the lhc

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Bot object that needs to be added to the lhc

200.description: Creates a bot with provided attributes

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Chat object that needs to be modified in Live Helper Chat

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Creates a chat and returns it's data

200.description: Creates a chat and returns it's attributes

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Bot object that needs to be added to the lhc

time.description: Chat creation time in unix timestamp

user_id.description: To what operator chat is assigned

hash.description: Security hash. Used to check that visitor has access to chat.

referrer.description: Referrer page. From what page customer come to website.

dep_id.description: To what department chat belongs to

user_typing.description: Holds timestamp then visitor started typing. Is updated constantly while visitor is typing.

operator_typing.description: Operator started typing. Stores timestamp then it started.

has_unread_messages.description: Has operator unread messages from visitor. 0 - no, 1 - yes

has_unread_op_messages.description: Has visitor unread messages from operator. 0 - no, 1 - yes

mail_send.description: Was mail send to customer. 0 - no, 1 - yes

additional_data.description: Stores additional passed chat data in JSON format.

session_referrer.description: From what page chat was started.

wait_time.description: How long visitor waited for chat being accepted.

chat_duration.description: How long chat took. Calculated on chat close.

chat_variables.description: Chat variables. These can store custom chat data accessed only by extensions. Stored as JSON format.

priority.description: Chat priority in pending chat list. Also used in auto assign workflow.

user_closed_ts.description: Timestamp then visitor closed a widget.

lsync.description: Last time visitor checked for new messages. Updated every 30 seconds from last update.

unread_messages_informed.description: Have we informed operator by e-mail. Etc. That there is unread chat messages from visitor.

unread_op_messages_informed.description: Have we informed visitor by e-mail. Etc. that there is unread chat messages from operator.

reinform_timeout.description: If messages stays for defined amount unread in seconds we should inform operator about unread message.

transfer_timeout_ts.description: Stores timestamp when the last transfer between departmetns accoured.

transfer_timeout_ac.description: Stores value how long change be pending before it's transfered to another department.

transfer_if_na.description: Transfer between departments enabled for this chat.

transfer_uid.description: Stores the user ID who transfered the chat.

na_cb_executed.description: Unanswered chat callback was executed. It's execution are based on 'run_unaswered_chat_workflow' value. erLhcoreClassChatWorkflow::unansweredChatWorkflow

nc_cb_executed.description: Stores indication that new chat informing workflow was executed.

fbst.description: 0 - No feedback left. 1 - Up voted. 2 - Down voted.

operation.description: What operation is pending visitor? Holds javascript to executed.

operation_admin.description: What operation is pending operator? Holds javascript to executed.

tslasign.description: Timestamp since last auto assignment. Used in chat auto balancing.

usaccept.description: Operator status while he was accepting chat

unanswered_chat.description: Was chat unanswered before user has left a chat

invitation_id.description: By what invitation chat was started

pnd_time.description: Time then chat became pending. Unix timestamp.

cls_time.description: Time then chat was closed. Unix timestamp.

anonymized.description: Was chat data anonymized. 0 - no, 1 - yes

configuration.description: Configuration attributes. Leave it empty just.

attr_str_1.description: Field can be used by extensions

attr_str_2.description: Field can be used by extensions

attr_str_3.description: Field can be used by extensions

ignore_required.description: Should we apply same required fields validation as starting chat from web interface.

ignore_bot.description: Should we ignore bot auto assignment workflow.

department.description: Department ID's. From what departments list chat is provided. You should include array of departments. Even if it's only one department.

messages.description: If you are creating chat and chat existed already in third party system it makes sense to pass also previous messages.

chat_variables.description: Provide additional chat variables which can be used by extension. E.g [{UUID: "Some internal value"}]

additional_data.description: Stores additional chat variables. These variables are visible by operators and have strict structure.

fields.Question: Visitor Initial Message. If you are passing messages argument makes sense just skip this

DepartamentID.description: To what department chat should be assigned

URLRefer.description: Chat referrer. Page URL or E.g CRM

r.description: Current session referer. E.g CRM Finance

bot_id.description: Bot ID to assign to chat. It will override department bot

operator.description: To what operator chat should be assigned directly

identifier.description: This can be used in extension and should be system name without constantly changing value

key.description: Operator sees this as passed variable name. Literal name.

r.description: Holds error message in case of an error

meta_msg.description: Meta message content. JSON encoded string.

user_id.description: User ID. Message type depends on user id. [0] - Visitor message, [> 0] - Operator Message, [-1] - System message. Not visible by visitor, [-2] Bot message

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Live Helper Chat
